00042 class uvm_common_phase : public uvm_phase
00043 {
00044 public:
00045     uvm_common_phase(std::string name, uvm_schedule* p_schedule, uvm_phase_type type = UVM_PRERUN_PHASE, uvm_phase_order = UVM_TOP_DOWN);
00046     ~uvm_common_phase();
00047 
00048     virtual int do_execute(sc_core::sc_module * pmod) { return 1; };
00049 
00050 protected:
00051     void process_state_executing_runtime(uvm_component* pcomp = NULL);
00052     void process_state_executing_nonruntime(sc_core::sc_module * pmod = NULL);
00053 
00054 };
